text:
I used to dream about producing
and writing a record.

When I decided to become an artist
it was a very conscious decision.
Good and bad, it's definitely been a sacrifice.

I love the fact that we've grown
so much together.
Being raised in a Section 8 household,
that was kind of what I was destined to be.

If you control your destiny and you work hard everyday,
and you don't let other people control it,
then you're in a good position.

I would make a song and I realized that I kind
of got a little better, a little better, a little better.

It was like, well maybe every time Iâ€™m making a song better
it could potentially make my life better.
If you really love what you do and you believe in yourself,
the right person will hear it at the right time.

If the possibility of what you could make happen excites you,
then you just got to go for it
